name: Sis 2: El vórtice (SpA)
description:
Sis 2: El vórtice (SpA) is a RPG Maker MV game made with love and by a bunch of friends. It's in spanish, but we are thinking to re-do the previous game and translate it to english and also this game!

We make pixel arts and things with Pixel Studio and Paint.net.The demo will be released in August 2020 (24th) Until that we are releasing Alpha and Beta versions. Full release will be avabiable in 2021 or 2022 we don't know exactly when.

Until that, all the releases will be "pr-r." (Pre-Releases)

The game was made by us (3liz.Oli Studios). We are from Spain, but we want to share with the world our games, gifs & our pixel arts. Sis 2: El vórtice is a very precious game and we will be happy to see you leaving your comments here.

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Remember to subscribe and enter our Discord & Game Jolt community!
